languages.text: "Это был его долг. Но он... до последнего не хотел покидать меня. Я видела это в его угасающем взгляде".

traits.locale_text: "Это был его долг. Я знаю, что он задержался по эту сторону. Как и то, что он... до последнего не хотел покидать меня. Я видела это — в его угасающем взгляде".

languages.text: "It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."
languages.original_text: "Это был его долг. Но он... до последнего не хотел покидать меня. Я видела это в его угасающем взгляде".

traits.locale_text: "It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me until the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."
"It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me until the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."
"It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."
"It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."
"It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."
"It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."

languages.text: « Il en allait de son devoir. Et pourtant... il a eu du mal à me laisser à la toute fin. Je l'ai vu au fond de ses yeux qui s'éteignaient. »
languages.original_text: "It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."

traits.locale_text: « Il en allait de son devoir. Et pourtant... il a eu du mal à me laisser à la toute fin. Je l'ai vu au fond de ses yeux qui s'éteignaient. »

languages.text: «Era su deber. Pero... se negó a dejarme hasta el final. Lo vi cuando se le apagaron los ojos».
languages.original_text: "It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."

traits.locale_text: «Era su deber. Pero... se negó a dejarme hasta el final. Lo vi cuando se le apagaron los ojos».

languages.text: 「それがあの人の務めでした。でもあの人は…最後まで私との別れを惜しんでいた。暗くなっていくあの人の目を見て分かりました」
languages.original_text: "It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."

traits.locale_text: 「それがあの人の務めでした。でもあの人は…最後まで私との別れを惜しんでいた。暗くなっていくあの人の目を見て分かりました」

languages.text: “这也是他的职责，可他……直到最后一刻都舍不得离我而去。当他的目光黯淡下来时，我看得真真切切。”
languages.original_text: "It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."

traits.locale_text: “这也是他的职责，可他……直到最后一刻都舍不得离我而去。当他的目光黯淡下来时，我看得真真切切。”

languages.text: "Es war seine Pflicht. Doch bis zum Ende hat er ... gezögert, mich zu verlassen. Ich habe es gesehen, als das Licht aus seinen Augen wich."
languages.original_text: "It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."

traits.locale_text: "Es war seine Pflicht. Doch bis zum Ende hat er ... gezögert, mich zu verlassen. Ich habe es gesehen, als das Licht aus seinen Augen wich."

languages.text: "Onun vazifesi buydu ancak... Sonuna kadar benden ayrılmaya karşı koydu. Gözlerindeki ışık söndüğünde gördüm bunu."
languages.original_text: "It was his duty. But he... was reluctant to leave me to the very end. I saw it as his eyes went dim."
